013package org.apache.juneau.bean.openapi3;
014
015import static org.apache.juneau.common.internal.Utils.*;
016import static org.apache.juneau.internal.CollectionUtils.*;
017import static org.apache.juneau.internal.ConverterUtils.*;
018
019import java.lang.reflect.*;
020import java.util.*;
021
022import org.apache.juneau.annotation.*;
023import org.apache.juneau.collections.*;
024import org.apache.juneau.internal.*;
025import org.apache.juneau.json.*;
026
027/**
028 * Root class for all Swagger beans.
029 */
030@FluentSetters
031public abstract class OpenApiElement {
032
033   private boolean strict;
034   private Map<String,Object> extra;
035
036   OpenApiElement() {}
037
038   OpenApiElement(OpenApiElement copyFrom) {
039      this.strict = copyFrom.strict;
040      this.extra = copyOf(copyFrom.extra);
041   }
042
043   /**
044    * Returns <jk>true</jk> if contents should be validated per the Swagger spec.
045    *
046    * @return <jk>true</jk> if contents should be validated per the Swagger spec.
047    */
048   protected boolean isStrict() {
049      return strict;
050   }
051
052   /**
053    * Sets strict mode on this bean.
054    *
055    * @return This object
056    */
057   protected OpenApiElement strict() {
058      strict = true;
059      return this;
060   }
061
062   /**
063    * Sets strict mode on this bean.
064    *
065    * @param value
066    *    The new value for this property.
067    *    <br>Non-boolean values will be converted to boolean using <code>Boolean.<jsm>valueOf</jsm>(value.toString())</code>.
068    *    <br>Can be <jk>null</jk> (interpreted as <jk>false</jk>).
069    * @return This object
070    */
071   protected OpenApiElement strict(Object value) {
072      strict = value != null && toBoolean(value);
073      return this;
074   }
075
076   /**
077    * Generic property getter.
078    *
079    * <p>
080    * Can be used to retrieve non-standard Swagger fields such as <js>"$ref"</js>.
081    *
082    * @param property The property name to retrieve.
083    * @param type The datatype to cast the value to.
084    * @param <T> The datatype to cast the value to.
085    * @return The property value, or <jk>null</jk> if the property does not exist or is not set.
086    */
087   public <T> T get(String property, Class<T> type) {
088      assertArgNotNull("property", property);
089      return toType(get(property), type);
090   }
091
092   /**
093    * Generic property getter.
094    *
095    * <p>
096    * Can be used to retrieve non-standard Swagger fields such as <js>"$ref"</js>.
097    *
098    * @param property The property name to retrieve.  Must not be <jk>null</jk>.
099    * @return The property value, or <jk>null</jk> if the property does not exist or is not set.
100    */
101   @Beanp("*")
102   public Object get(String property) {
103      assertArgNotNull("property", property);
104      return opt(extra).map(x -> x.get(property)).orElse(null);
105   }
106
107   /**
108    * Generic property setter.
109    *
110    * <p>
111    * Can be used to set non-standard Swagger fields such as <js>"$ref"</js>.
112    *
113    * @param property The property name to set.  Must not be <jk>null</jk>.
114    * @param value The new value for the property.
115    * @return This object
116    * @throws RuntimeException if strict mode is enabled.
117    */
118   @Beanp("*")
119   public OpenApiElement set(String property, Object value) {
120      assertArgNotNull("property", property);
121      if (strict)
122         throw new RuntimeException("Cannot set property '" + property + "' in strict mode.");
123      if (extra == null)
124         extra = map();
125      extra.put(property, value);
126      return this;
127   }
128
129   /**
130    * Generic property keyset.
131    *
132    * @return
133    *    All the non-standard keys on this element.
134    *    <br>Never <jk>null</jk>.
135    */
136   @Beanp("*")
137   public Set<String> extraKeys() {
138      return extra == null ? Collections.emptySet() : extra.keySet();
139   }
140
141   /**
142    * Returns all the keys on this element.
143    *
144    * @return
145    *    All the keys on this element.
146    *    <br>Never <jk>null</jk>.
147    */
148   public Set<String> keySet() {
149      return extraKeys();
150   }
151
152   /**
153    * Returns a copy of this swagger element as a modifiable map.
154    *
155    * <p>
156    * Each call produces a new map.
157    *
158    * @return A map containing all the values in this swagger element.
159    */
160   public JsonMap asMap() {
161      var m = new JsonMap();
162      for (var s : keySet())
163         m.put(s, get(s, Object.class));
164      return m;
165   }
166
167   // <FluentSetters>
168
169   // </FluentSetters>
170
171   @Override /* Object */
172   public String toString() {
173      if (Modifier.isAbstract(getClass().getModifiers())) {
174         return JsonSerializer.DEFAULT_SORTED.toString(extra);
175      }
176      return JsonSerializer.DEFAULT_SORTED.toString(this);
177   }
178}
